entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Mont-Laurier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:28 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 5:46 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:46 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening. Forecast issued 5:46 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
